propAnimation:
The animation.
If `false` the animation effect is disabled.
propChildren: Optional children to infer width and height from.
propClasses: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.
propComponent:
The component used for the root node.
Either a string to use a HTML element or a component.
propHeight:
Height of the skeleton.
Useful when you don't want to adapt the skeleton to a text element but for instance a card.
propVariant: The type of content that will be rendered.
propWidth:
Width of the skeleton.
Useful when the skeleton is inside an inline element with no width of its own.
stylesRoot: Styles applied to the root element.
stylesText: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="text"`.
stylesRectangular: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="rectangular"`.
stylesCircular: Styles applied to the root element if `variant="circular"`.
stylesPulse: Styles applied to the root element if `animation="pulse"`.
stylesWave: Styles applied to the root element if `animation="wave"`.
stylesWithChildren: Styles applied when the component is passed children.
stylesFitContent: Styles applied when the component is passed children and no width.
stylesHeightAuto: Styles applied when the component is passed children and no height.
